name: Flap Royale
description:
Flap Royale is fun flapping real-time multiplayer battle royale style game. This game has lots of customisation options and friend system so people can play with their friends in just 5 seconds.

Play with your friends in real-time action multiplayer battle royale flappy bird style game, try to get victory royale! earn diamonds! unlock all the customisations and be the best among all other birds! We concentrate to our community suggestions so you can join our discord server found on left top corner in the game and share your experience, ideas, skins, hats of the game.

Features:

  • Real-Time live action battle royale with up to 100 birds per game
  • Friend & party system, you can send/receive/accept friend requests and invite friends to party and play all-together
  • Customisation system, you can change you skin, hat (more options coming soon)

How-To play instructions:

  1. Press the play button
  2. Click on screen to flap! or press SPACE on keyboard :)
